alert.note: Alert for Logan; Montgomery; Polk; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 2:17AM CST until February 22 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Logan County in western Arkansas... Northeastern Polk County in western Arkansas... Scott County in western Arkansas... Western Yell County in central Arkansas... Northern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 217 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Echo to 6 miles south of Waldron, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Cardiff... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Mount Magazine... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Wing... Winfield... Olio... Bluffton... Boles... Grayson... Blue Ball... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for western and central Arkansas.
